name: Karato Foxhunter
aura: Increases Ally C. RATE in All Battles by 20%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Three Visitations
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Stun] debuff for 2 turns. Grants an Extra turn and resets the cooldown of this skill if Yumeko is on the same team and this skill kills an enemy.
skills.name: Bedevil
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted if Yumeko is on the same team.
skills.name: Suppression Ward
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Damage inflicted by this Champion cannot be decreased by enemy Passive skills or Masteries, except by the Passive skills of Bosses. 

Damage inflicted by this Champion cannot be increased by either this Champion's Masteries or ally Passive skills, except when attacking Bosses.

Whenever Yumeko dies, instantly grants a turn to this Champion and resets the cooldowns of each of this Championâ€™s skills.
skills.name: Stoicism [P]
